title: Sri Lanka to hike taxes back to 2019 levels: Minister
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka will hike taxes back to 2019 under changes proposed by Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe have been approved, cabinet spokesman Bandula Gunawardena said.
A supplementary estimate of 695 billion rupees will be presented to parliament.
Cabinet has approved changes to the following tax laws to raise revenue.
